bibl.title: Bahriya Oasis. Recent Research into the Past of an Egyptian Oasis.

bibl.seg: Marek Dospěl & Lenka Suková, Exploration of the El-Hayz Oasis: Issues, Approaches, Challenges.
Marek Dospěl & Lenka Suková (edd.), Bahriya Oasis. Recent Research into the Past of an Egyptian Oasis (Prague, 2013) pp. 3-18, 2 tabl., 5 figg.

1. Introduction. - 2. Overview of the Czech investigation of the El-Hayz Oasis. - 3. El-Hayz in the Roman and Byzantine period (1st century BC - 7th century AD): issues, approaches, challenges. - 4. Contribution of textual sources (the case of Bir Shawish). - 5. Perspectives. - 6. Bibliography.
